meaning_str.bing:
v. 爬；攀登；爬升；登山
n. 攀登；攀缘；爬阶梯；攀登用的时间
网络. 攀爬；往上爬；上升

攀登；攀缘；爬阶梯；攀登用的时间

爬；攀登；登山；攀岩；爬升；上升；增加；上涨；升空；上坡；蔓生；攀缘生长；晋升；提升位置
攀登；上升；爬升；提升；攀爬；攀缘；登山；爬坡；上升途径；社会地位提高；增长；上涨；增加；升值

1.en: The next day the girl wore an even shorter skirt the boy said to her again, "I bet you can't climb that tree" , pointing to a taller one.
1.cn: 第二天，小女孩穿了一条更短的裙子，那男孩指着一棵更高的树对她说：我敢打赌你爬不上那棵树。

2.en: You will have to climb out of your skin two or three more times.
2.cn: 你必须蜕皮两次或三次以上。

3.en: Theon was staggering by the time he reached the foot of the stair. He slung the girl over his shoulder and began to climb.
3.cn: 席恩拖着蹒跚的脚来到楼梯下，他将女孩背到肩上开始攀爬。

0.en: I'd like to climb your hair, test that out.
0.cn: 我也想爬上你的头发测试一下。

1.en: Do you mean assist you? Yeah, whatever. Ok, I'll climb up.
1.cn: 你是说踩着你爬上去吗? 是的，随便了。好吧 我来爬。

2.en: We've only been plugged in a week and every day it's, "Climb the building, then fight bugs. Climb the building, fight more bugs!"
2.cn: 我们才上线一周每天都是 "爬楼 打虫子""继续爬 再打虫子!"

3.en: Ellie, it's so beautiful. We made it. We made it. Russell, we can float right over there. Climb up, climb up.
3.cn: Ellie，太美了，我们成功了，我们成功了， Russell ，我们可以飘过去，爬上去，爬上去。

4.en: Now wait. He'll climb in bed with us. Just give him a minute.
4.cn: 等着吧，他会爬上床加入我们的，给他点时间。

5.en: Farkle, how'd you get up there? I thought you couldn't climb the ropes.
5.cn: 法尔科，你是怎么上去的？你不是不会爬绳子吗？

6.en: And one day, while she was in a tree, the curious little bear wanted to climb to the top. And no sooner than she climbed to the top she saw something new and died!
6.cn: 有一天 她在一棵树里的时候，这只好奇的小熊想爬到树顶。她一爬到树顶，看到了新的事物，就死了!

7.en: I'll just climb up and get it. The tree's much too thin to take your weight, Daddy Pig.
7.cn: 那我就爬上去把它拿下来。这些树枝太细了，根本承受不了的你的重量。

8.en: OK. I'll climb up instead. Hooray. Oh, I seem to be stuck. Dogs are not very good at climbing trees.
8.cn: 好吧，那我爬上去好了。好耶！噢，我好像没困住了。看来狗也不擅长爬树。

9.en: I need you to place the charge on the inner door. Climb back to airlock 2 along the hull. Copy. I'm on my way.
9.cn: 我需要你把炸弹放在内侧的门上，然后从外壳爬回2号气密舱好的，我这就过去。

10.en: You need to increase your spider intake, so he'll be able to climb ceilings properly. And eat lots of sheep bile.
10.cn: 你需要增加蜘蛛的摄入量，那么他就可以有能力爬上天花板了，还有多吃羊胆汁。

11.en: When somebody does not buzz you in, Ross, that means go away. That doesn't mean please climb up the fire escape.
11.cn: 当别人不开门不让你进来的时候，那表示“走开”，那并不表示请你爬防火梯上来。

12.en: I don't think I can fit through the door. That's because your tummy is too big. I know. Daddy Pig can climb in through the top.
12.cn: 我觉得我可能进不了这扇门。那是因为你的肚子太大啦。我想到了，你可以从屋顶上面爬进去。

13.en: Like the vacation planet. Surf a 50-foot monster wave in Hawaii. You can ski down the pyramids. You can climb Mount Everest with Batman.
13.cn: 例如度假星球。挑战夏威夷15米高的巨浪。或在金字塔上滑雪。甚至可以爬上珠峰和蝙蝠侠一起。

14.en: Night, night, fake Riley. I was once as innocent as you. But now all I have to do is climb out that window and then I am just like this wicked woman over here.
14.cn: 晚安了，假莱丽。我曾经也跟你一样纯真，但现在我却要偷偷爬出窗变成跟她一样的小魔女了。

15.en: You can unlock doors, sneak past guards climb the wall, but if you don't take out that monkey you ain't going nowhere. You wanna get out of here? Get rid of that monkey!
15.cn: 你可以打开门，绕过守卫爬上墙，但是如果你不制服那只猴子，你就哪儿都别去，你想逃出去吗? 那就除掉那个猴子!

16.en: No big deal. Just tell me this. Can you climb? Yeah.
16.cn: 然后没啥了不起的，跟我说说你会爬树吗？会呀。

17.en: I know I'm asking for a lot, but I don't climb and you do.
17.cn: 我知道我要求的太多了，可我不会爬树，而你会。

18.en: Quick, Daddy! Look! It's in that little tree! Hmmm. I'll just climb up and get it.
18.cn: 快点，爸爸！看！它在那棵小树上！嗯。我要爬山树把它拿下来。

19.en: Forgive me, your highness, for I am but a monkey, and it is in my nature to climb, I did not mean to gaze upon you as you comb your hair.
19.cn: 请原谅，公主陛下，我只是一只猴子，我的天性就是爬树，我不是故意在你梳头时弄乱你的头发。
